title: John Mackay (rugby league)
text:
John Mackay is an Australian former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer in the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League%20premiership">New South Wales Rugby League premiership</a>. He played with <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a> club <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Eastern Suburbs</a> in the years 1976, 1978–1979 and 1983–1988. He also played for the <a href="Newtown%20Jets">Newtown Jets</a> from 1980 to 1982.
A <a href="Rugby%20league%20positions">Backrower</a>, Mackay played in 94 first grade matches for Eastern Suburbs, and 21 for the <a href="Newtown%20Jets">Newtown Jets</a> club.
His son <a href="Shawn%20Mackay">Shawn</a> was a member of <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Easts</a> Jersey Flegg (U21) winning side in the 2002 season. His son died 6 April 2009 from an infection following a motor vehicle accident.
